LanguageData.RC2_MakeVegetableJuiceBulk.label: make vegetable juice in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_MakeVegetableJuiceBulk.description: Uses one or more vegetables to make delicious juice. Makes 25.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeTonicSodaBulk.label: make tonic soda in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_MakeTonicSodaBulk.description: Uses any kind of sweetener to make bubbly tonic soda. Makes 25.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeFruitSodaBulk.label: make fruit soda in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_MakeFruitSodaBulk.description: Uses any kind of sweetener and a mix of fruits to make bubbly fruit soda. Makes 5.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeEggnogBulk.label: make eggnog in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_MakeEggnogBulk.description: Make eggnog from eggs, milk, and sweeteners. Mmmm. Makes 25.
LanguageData.RC2_ProcessEnergyDrinkBulk.label: make energy drinks in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_ProcessEnergyDrinkBulk.description: Mix sugar, coffee beans, and fruit to make energy drinks. Makes 25.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeHotCocoaBulk.label: make hot cocoa in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_MakeHotCocoaBulk.description: Combines delicious chocolate and milk for a belly-warming treat. Great for cold winter nights! Makes 25.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeIcedTeaBulk.label: make iced tea in bulk
LanguageData.RC2_MakeIcedTeaBulk.description: Combines tea, a sweetener, and some fruit into a delicious drink fantastic for hot summer days. Makes 25.
